There exists a sprawling city, a grim and repulsive
fusion of metal serving as dwelling for many demons.
The structures are erected atop preexisting memories,
The expansion of such a city and the obliteration
of the past deeply trouble me.
For those who cling to their past, \.memories serve
as the bedrock that keeps them rooted in place.
I'm aware that you're already on a mission to
erect the tower as a beacon for the Bodhi tree...
but I must request that, \.in your journeys, \.you
investigate this city to find a way to halt its growth.
I apologize for my lengthy ramble. \.I promise that the
next time we meet will be more worth your time.
You've been brought to my home, \.where you may find
I nearly forgot to introduce myself; \.

burdening you with my requests and concerns.

so you are more of the quiet type....

well, \.while you rest, \.feel free to ask me

what were you doing in the naraka?
I offer guidance to those in need, \.particularly
those who are in the process of losing themselves.
I provide them with a sense of calmness and clarity
during the transition from one life to the next.
While the Naraka can be confusing, \.I find solace in
having a home to return to at the end of each day.
Yes, I'm familiar with Melpomene.\. She used to visit
Perhaps now that you and I are friends, \.you can
bring Melpomene along for a visit.
Well, \.what is there to share about myself?

I promise that if anything eventful happens to me,

but eventually, \.you will both find liberation.
I understand. \.Well, \.I do hope to have the
opportunity to see you again soon.
Cleansing one's soul is a truly challenging task, \.
I much prefer offering guidance to those who
However, \.from time to time, \.there are individuals

and resentment from a past life that they

you're recognizing beauty that exists alongside tragedy.
